A sermon preached before the queen at White-Hall, on the fast, July 15. 1691. By R. Meggott, D.D. Dean of Winchester, and chaplain to Their Majesties. Published by her Majesties special command. Meggott, Richard, d. 1692.
[2], 31, [1] p.
printed for Tho. Bennet, at the Half-Moon in St. Paul's Church-yard, London : MDCXCI. [1691]
Reproduction of the original in the Christ Church Library, Oxford.
=======
